answers.answer: Hello,Without examination,it is very difficult to confirm a diagnosis but the various possibilities for your symptoms are peptic ulcers,inflammatory bowel disease(ulcerative colitis),cyclosporiosis,abdominal growths or malignancy,diabetes and Addison’s disease.It will be after thorough investigations like blood sugar ,blood tests,upper GI endoscopy and colonoscopy and sigmoidoscopy that an accurate diagnosis can be made.Treatment will depend on the same.Hope it helps.Take care and pls do keep me posted on how you are doing or if you have any additional queries.
